testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the job titles
testcase.name: Verify the edit user and delete job titles functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user navigates to already created job title with "Data Analyst"...undefined When the user clicks on edit button for the user with "Data Analyst"........skipped Then the user is in Edit Job Title page.....................................skipped When user edits with parameters "Data Scientist", "Making descisions on analysed data", "Making descisions on analysed data".skipped And the user clicks on Save button in Edit Job Title page...................skipped Then the records should be updated as "Data Scientist", "Making descisions on analysed data".skipped And user notes the total records of the Job Titles..........................skipped When the user clicks on delete button for the user with "Data Analyst"......skipped And the user clicks YES on Are you sure? Dialog.............................skipped Then the job Title will be deleted from the records.........................skipped
